title: How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.

author: Claire Franken
excerpt: Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 debuts on Australia 9Now on Jan. 27, 2025 — here's how to watch online in the U.S. for free with a VPN.
text: Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 is gearing up to walk down the aisle. If you’re a fan living Stateside, you can keep up with all the latest newlywed drama by signing up for a VPN. Below, we’re breaking down all the ways to watch MAFS Australia in the U.S. How to Watch ‘Married at First Sight Australia’ in the U.S. Where to Watch Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 in the U.S. The best way to watch MAFS Australia in the U.S. when it debuts on Monday, Jan. 27 at 7:30 pm local time is by signing up for a Virtual Private Network (VPN). By signing up for a VPN, you can access content that’s typically restricted based on your location. Australia’s Channel 9 will broadcast the series on TV and stream it online on 9Now. Those who do not live Down Under can use a VPN to access the shows week-to-week. Below, we’re listing our top VPN recommendations for watching MAFS Australia in the U.S. How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.: ExpressVPN Since ExpressVPN can be cancelled at any time and offers a 30-day guarantee, this is one of the most cost-effective, low-stakes ways to watch MAFS Australia in the U.S. online. Right now, if you sign up for a 2-year plan and pay up front, you can get four months free. Though you pay in a lump sum, the cost shakes out to just $4.99/month. Or, you can subscribe to the 12-month plan to get three months free for $99.95, which comes out to $6.67/month. Alternatively, the single-month subscription goes for $12.95/month. Regardless of the plan you choose, ExpressVPN is easy to set up, promises lightning-fast speeds, 24-hour live-chat support and allows users to connect to eight devices at once. Once you sign up for the VPN, you can even access other international shows like the UK’s Naked Attraction, free coverage of major sporting events like the Australian Open and international versions of streamers including Netflix, Disney Plus and Max — which include different content than in the U.S. Here are step-by-step instructions for how to watch Married at First Sight Australia and more international hits in the U.S. using ExpressVPN: Select a subscription for ExpressVPN Create an account by entering an email address and payment information, then login Install ExpressVPN by clicking “Download” on the Dashboard or in the Set Up Your Devices tab Set up ExpressVPN by entering the Activation Code from the Dashboard/Set Up Your Devices tab Change your location to Australia by turning the connect icon to “Connected” and selecting Australia in the Smart Location menu Visit Married at First Sight’s page on 9Now and select an episode Create a 9Now account for free and sign in Start watching Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.! How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.: PureVPN Another great way for streaming Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S. is by signing up for PureVPN. This subscription service offers a 31-day money back guarantee, meaning you can sign up and try it out for yourself without the fear of commitment. We love PureVPN because it offers reliable streaming on multiple devices. We also like that plans even offer a personal privacy manager feature, which helps you keeps tabs on your digital well-being. One month of the standard plan costs $12.95/month; one year is $3.99/month; and two years (plus an additional four free months) comes out to $2.15/month. Here are step-by-step instructions for watching MAFS Australia in the U.S. with AtlasVPN: Sign up for PureVPN and create an account Scroll to the bottom of PureVPN’s homepage to find and select your supported device (i.e. Windows, Mac, etc.) Click “Download the App” for the platform of your choice Install PureVPN, then log into your account Change your location to UK by searching and selecting the country in the right rail Visit Married at First Sight’s page on 9Now and select an episode Create a 9Now account for free and sign in Start watching Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.! How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.: NordVPN NordVPN is another subscription VPN service that can be used for watching MAFS Australia in the U.S. NordVPN allows users to connect to the service on six devices, offers double VPN servers for added protection and monitors the dark web for data breaches. Plus, there is 30-day a money-back guarantee. The standard plan costs $12.99 for one month, $4.99/month for one year and $3.39/month for two years. You can also upgrade your plan for an added cost to unlock even more benefits. (See full package breakdown.) Here are step-by-step instructions for streaming MAFS Australia in the U.S. with NordVPN: Sign up for NordVPN, create an account and login Click “Downloads” in the menu on the left Install NordVPN, sign in and set up the program on your device Click “Quick Connect” to change your location to Australia, or by searching for the country in the menu Click Married at First Sight’s page on the 9Now site Create a 9Now account for free and sign in Start watching Married At First Sight Australia in the U.S.! When Is Married at First Sight Australia Season 12? Release Date, Time MAFS Australia Season 12 begins on Monday, Jan. 27 at 7:30 pm local time in Australia. Who Are the MAFS Australia Experts in 2025? In 2025’s Season 12 of the reality series, Clinical sexologist Alessandra Rampolla, dating and relationship expert Melissa Schilling and relationship expert John Aiken are all returning as experts. The MAFS experts help guide the couples through their MAFS journey after marrying a stranger. Who Is in the Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 Cast? The official MAFS Australia Instagram page has offered a glimpse of confirmed cast members for Season 12. The cast includes: Jacqui (29), Tony (53), Katie (37), Awhina (30), Jamie (28), Ryan (36), Rhi (34), Adrian (30), Carina (31), Morena (57), Paul (30), Sierah (32), Billy (31), Jeff (39) and Dave (36). Where to Watch Married at First Sight Australia Season 11 Prior seasons of MAFS Australia, including the most recently concluded Season 11, can be viewed on 9Now’s site. Once you get set up with a VPN, you can not only stream MAFS Australia Season 12, but you also unlock all the marital drama of past seasons.
html:
Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 is gearing up to walk down the aisle. If you’re a fan living Stateside, you can keep up with all the latest newlywed drama by signing up for a VPN. Below, we’re breaking down all the ways to watch MAFS Australia in the U.S.

How to Watch ‘Married at First Sight Australia’ in the U.S.

Where to Watch Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 in the U.S.

The best way to watch MAFS Australia in the U.S. when it debuts on Monday, Jan. 27 at 7:30 pm local time is by signing up for a Virtual Private Network (VPN). By signing up for a VPN, you can access content that’s typically restricted based on your location. Australia’s Channel 9 will broadcast the series on TV and stream it online on 9Now. Those who do not live Down Under can use a VPN to access the shows week-to-week. Below, we’re listing our top VPN recommendations for watching MAFS Australia in the U.S.

How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.: ExpressVPN

Since ExpressVPN can be cancelled at any time and offers a 30-day guarantee, this is one of the most cost-effective, low-stakes ways to watch MAFS Australia in the U.S. online. Right now, if you sign up for a 2-year plan and pay up front, you can get four months free. Though you pay in a lump sum, the cost shakes out to just $4.99/month. Or, you can subscribe to the 12-month plan to get three months free for $99.95, which comes out to $6.67/month. Alternatively, the single-month subscription goes for $12.95/month. Regardless of the plan you choose, ExpressVPN is easy to set up, promises lightning-fast speeds, 24-hour live-chat support and allows users to connect to eight devices at once.

Once you sign up for the VPN, you can even access other international shows like the UK’s Naked Attraction, free coverage of major sporting events like the Australian Open and international versions of streamers including Netflix, Disney Plus and Max — which include different content than in the U.S. Here are step-by-step instructions for how to watch Married at First Sight Australia and more international hits in the U.S. using ExpressVPN:

  1. Select a subscription for ExpressVPN
  2. Create an account by entering an email address and payment information, then login
  3. Install ExpressVPN by clicking “Download” on the Dashboard or in the Set Up Your Devices tab
  4. Set up ExpressVPN by entering the Activation Code from the Dashboard/Set Up Your Devices tab
  5. Change your location to Australia by turning the connect icon to “Connected” and selecting Australia in the Smart Location menu
  6. Visit Married at First Sight’s page on 9Now and select an episode
  7. Create a 9Now account for free and sign in
  8. Start watching Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.!

How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.: PureVPN

Another great way for streaming Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S. is by signing up for PureVPN. This subscription service offers a 31-day money back guarantee, meaning you can sign up and try it out for yourself without the fear of commitment. We love PureVPN because it offers reliable streaming on multiple devices. We also like that plans even offer a personal privacy manager feature, which helps you keeps tabs on your digital well-being. One month of the standard plan costs $12.95/month; one year is $3.99/month; and two years (plus an additional four free months) comes out to $2.15/month.

Here are step-by-step instructions for watching MAFS Australia in the U.S. with AtlasVPN:

  1. Sign up for PureVPN and create an account
  2. Scroll to the bottom of PureVPN’s homepage to find and select your supported device (i.e. Windows, Mac, etc.)
  3. Click “Download the App” for the platform of your choice
  4. Install PureVPN, then log into your account
  5. Change your location to UK by searching and selecting the country in the right rail
  6. Visit Married at First Sight’s page on 9Now and select an episode
  7. Create a 9Now account for free and sign in
  8. Start watching Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.!

How to Watch Married at First Sight Australia in the U.S.: NordVPN

NordVPN is another subscription VPN service that can be used for watching MAFS Australia in the U.S. NordVPN allows users to connect to the service on six devices, offers double VPN servers for added protection and monitors the dark web for data breaches. Plus, there is 30-day a money-back guarantee. The standard plan costs $12.99 for one month, $4.99/month for one year and $3.39/month for two years. You can also upgrade your plan for an added cost to unlock even more benefits. (See full package breakdown.)

Here are step-by-step instructions for streaming MAFS Australia in the U.S. with NordVPN:

  1. Sign up for NordVPN, create an account and login
  2. Click “Downloads” in the menu on the left
  3. Install NordVPN, sign in and set up the program on your device
  4. Click “Quick Connect” to change your location to Australia, or by searching for the country in the menu
  5. Click Married at First Sight’s page on the 9Now site
  6. Create a 9Now account for free and sign in
  7. Start watching Married At First Sight Australia in the U.S.!

When Is Married at First Sight Australia Season 12? Release Date, Time

MAFS Australia Season 12 begins on Monday, Jan. 27 at 7:30 pm local time in Australia.

Who Are the MAFS Australia Experts in 2025?

In 2025’s Season 12 of the reality series, Clinical sexologist Alessandra Rampolla, dating and relationship expert Melissa Schilling and relationship expert John Aiken are all returning as experts. The MAFS experts help guide the couples through their MAFS journey after marrying a stranger.

Who Is in the Married at First Sight Australia Season 12 Cast?

The official MAFS Australia Instagram page has offered a glimpse of confirmed cast members for Season 12. The cast includes: Jacqui (29), Tony (53), Katie (37), Awhina (30), Jamie (28), Ryan (36), Rhi (34), Adrian (30), Carina (31), Morena (57), Paul (30), Sierah (32), Billy (31), Jeff (39) and Dave (36).

Where to Watch Married at First Sight Australia Season 11

Prior seasons of MAFS Australia, including the most recently concluded Season 11, can be viewed on 9Now’s site. Once you get set up with a VPN, you can not only stream MAFS Australia Season 12, but you also unlock all the marital drama of past seasons.
